name: MoodleQuiz
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: moodle quiz
des:
With this Skill, you can answer online quizzes in a course on Moodle (a popular opensource learning management system). This is a demo version.
See http://tkita.net/ai/moodle_quiz_vui.html for details.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
